reviewText: Very interesting and informative for a disabled person.
All good, I am happy customer : )
Fairly straight forward,much of it was similar to baton training I learned in the military.  The DVD does let you see the flow of the moves well.

Very good, it taught me a lot and I had a chance to use it in real life when some idiot attacked me while I was in a grocery line.  There was something wrong with this guy and I feel if I did not know this he would of hurt me real bad.  Even with people standing around and were shocked that this person would attack someone like me who can barely walk and with a cane, but no one did anything, they were cowards.
a good dvd for walking cane defense based mainly on the Filipino martial arts mostly blocking and striking it would be a good dvd for your collection
